companyDescription: Weymedia operates GeniusCash, a Canadian fintech app that rewards users with cashback on everyday purchases.
description: Led development of GeniusCash iOS and GeniusCash Android using React Native + TypeScript
Designed and optimized Bitbucket CI/CD pipelines with self-hosted runners, ensuring zero-cost deployments and a smooth release process
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality customer experiences, improving app usability and performance
Reviewed pull requests, provided mentorship, and drove best coding practices for a scalable codebase
achievements: Delivered GeniusCash app supporting real-time cashback rewards
App has paid out over $4 million to Canadians
